body.section:
How can you describe complex things using simple language?
The answers to these questions will help you to prepare for your own test.
Speaking task:
Describe a piece of modern art and explain how it made you feel when you saw it.
Practice what you would say and then look at the checklist below of strategies that you could include.
Did you find ways:- to get around vocabulary you didn't know?- to explain things clearly without knowing the correct vocabulary?- to use expressions to give you more time to think?
